statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.55}+{5.13}\right)}={19.36}\approx{19.36}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.13}\cdot{4.16}={21.3408}\approx{21.3}.
